text: They've been going through a very nasty divorce settlement following their 10 - month marriage. And it's now been revealed that Audrina Patridge and her estranged ex - husband Corey Bohan have worked out a custody deal over their two - year - old old daughter Kirra Max. According to The Blast, the 33 - year - old The Hills star will be the primary care - taker, however, the couple are still working out their final custody schedule and child support payment amounts.
